name: teamup
description: This project is being worked on as a part of COMP30022, a subject titled "IT Project" from the University of Melbourne. In this semester (Semester 2, 2022) our goal was to create a platform where individuals will be able to store any recipes that are special to them or recipes that they may frequent often.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-frontend && npm run build-frontend && npm run install-backend
